snippet.title: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit the website: https://atelier.games/resleriana_rw/us/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=AnnouncementUS&utm_id=Caption

A new RPG from the Atelier series. Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian is coming in 2025! 

A new adventure with new protagonists and an original story in the world of “Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator” is coming to PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™ and Steam® as a “completely offline” title. 

Building on the experiences of the Atelier series while also evolving, we invite you to look forward to another story of "Resleriana". 

Join the #KTFamily
Twitter: https://x.com/KoeiTecmoUS
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/koeitecmous
IG: https://www.instagram.com/koeitecmous/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/KTFamily 

*Screens are taken from an in-development version.
